argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cntri.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | cntri.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) |
| 3 |  | cntri.z | |- Z = ( Cntr ` M ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Cntz ` M ) = ( Cntz ` M ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_cntrval | |- ( ( Cntz ` M ) ` B ) = ( Cntr ` M ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_eqtr4i | |- Z = ( ( Cntz ` M ) ` B ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( X e. Z <-> X e. ( ( Cntz ` M ) ` B ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 4 | #P_cntzi | |- ( ( X e. ( ( Cntz ` M ) ` B ) /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylanb | |- ( ( X e. Z /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) |
